column4: Gutsy is incredible. I don't think I've ever been more impressed by an OS.
yeah? worked perfectly for me, except I want 1600x1200 resolution, and it only gives me 1280x1024.
any idea how to change that?
the biggest os step ive ever done was win98se to win2000. THAT was night vs day. Not even dos to 3.1 was that profound ;)
